item.content: She thinks that it is important that only those who are competent make decisions that are important.
When offered a lot, she choses not to take so much of it. She thinks that for being comfortable, she does not need much.
She thinks that is important to be persistent. When she is convinced of something, she thinks sticking to it is a good thing.
She thinks that only when she is disciplined, she will accomplish something in life. She thinks that it is important for her to maintain control over herself.
She thinks that having a goal in mind to work for is important. She thinks that it is honourable to have clear ambition in life.
She thinks that it is good to be open to change. Only if she is flexible, she thinks, will she be able to deal with life.
Others are important to her. She thinks that is good to help even if she does not get anything in return.
She thinks that it is important that things are done in the correct way. She believes, things work out only when done carefully, precise, and accurate.
From time to time, it is important for her that people enjoy their lives. She can think of many things that make life comfortable.
For her it is very important to life around people who look after each other. She believes that a strong community is crucial.
She thinks that it is unfair if people are treated differently, depending on certain attributes they have. People should have an equal chance to participate.
She thinks that it important that every group in society is proportionally represented. To her, fair decisions should only be made when everyone has an equal saying in it.
She is convinced that it is good to help each other out. She believes that people should support each other more.
It is important to her to have strong leadership. She thinks that complicated decisions should be made by those in charge.
She believes that it is important to work hard in order to achieve things in life.
It is important to her that in important decisions those that are affected have a say in it.
She thinks that it is okay to make mistakes. She thinks that people should learn to accept other peopleâ€™s or their own shortcomings.
It is important for her that things are being planned carefully. She believes that it a good plan is essential to most things.
For her, life is about self-realization. She believes that it is important to do the things in life that are interesting and that help herself to grow.
She thinks that not everything needs a plan. For her it is important to sometimes be open to do things spontaneously.
In her view, tradition can help people to orient themselves and give them stability. She therefore believes that tradition it is very important.
Is her view, society should not be restrictive, and anyone should have the chance to stand up for themselves. She thinks that being independent is very important.
In her view, society would work a lot better if people behaved responsible. It is important for her to think about the people around her.
She believes that the world is changing rapidly. She therefore thinks that willingness to change is essential.
She believes that everyone in society should enjoy life more. For her it makes not much sense for a society to suppress the individual needs with social norms.
